SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class SocketClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.SocketClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientInterface
public class SocketClient extends Object implements ClientInterface
This class is used to handle the client side of the socket connection.

      public void setOnConnectionAction(int response, List<Integer> startingGamesId, List<Integer> gamesWithDisconnectionsId)
      This method is used to set the action to perform on connection.
      Specified by:
      setOnConnectionAction in interface ClientInterface
      Parameters:
      response - is the action to perform.
      startingGamesId - is the list of the starting games' id.
      gamesWithDisconnectionsId - is the list of the games with disconnections id.

    • catchPing

      public void catchPing()
      This method is used to catch the ping, resetting the timer. If the ping is not caught, the client is disconnected.
